data.text: @adela_buzescu @sammy_underwood It has a synthetic plastic like substance that surrounds your cells. Who in their right mind thought this up that it would be ok???
@adela_buzescu @LisaLisahuesman Which is literally what you are doing, except you aren't filtering. You don't trust vaccines, so you post anything contrary without fact checking. Projection.
@LisaLisahuesman @adela_buzescu Here in Canada, we have more people with blot clots from covid cause they passed on getting AstraZeneca than from AstraZeneca. These adverse reactions are rare.

@LisaLisahuesman @adela_buzescu There aren't 5 months old, that's when they started vaccinating generally. Trials started over a year ago on some, so 1 year old vaccines. Also over a billion doses so far. https://t.co/WNIZ0SpvpJ

@LisaLisahuesman @sqirlgirly Yeah... but people will only filter data that they want to believe because that is how CNN has programmed them.  When I first started questioning the vaccines I was reading and the understanding but could not believe it. I was on denial for many years.
@sqirlgirly @adela_buzescu Check the VAERS, not USA Today’s spin. Go to the source. Regardless, there CANNOT be long term side effect data on a 5 month old “vaccine.”

@adela_buzescu @sqirlgirly Lol, the CDC and NIH do have the studies for the mRNA RSV trials, the metadata stating masks don’t work against viral transmission and the VAERS for all vaccines. The CDC is actually giving guidance in direct contradiction to their own data!

@sqirlgirly @LisaLisahuesman Define misinformation. I consider misinformation the fact that CDC says the vaccines are safe and effective. So I am just putting out there the other possibility. That they are NOT safe and effective. If there was not such a push for everyone to take it, I wouldn’t have cared.
@adela_buzescu @LisaLisahuesman You post misinformation from unreliable sources yet say you trust no one. So why are you spreading misinformation if you don’t trust it either?
@sqirlgirly @LisaLisahuesman Lol...  yeah. You follow CDC. I will trust no one with my body.

@LisaLisahuesman @adela_buzescu Cause there is data it’s safe and you instead are falling for someone spreading misinformation. Follow the CDC, not random people on the internet. https://t.co/wqXIIAhodz
@LisaLisahuesman Yep. Sick and tired with the guilt tripping.
@adela_buzescu Or “do it for others.” It’s sickening how these bureaucrats use our altruism to manipulate us!
@LisaLisahuesman Shush... stop asking the questions. Just roll up your sleeve.

@adela_buzescu I pray these shots are “safe and effective.” But, for the love of God, why would we take any chance on an Emergency Use Authorized vaccine with ZERO long term safety data by giving them to the healthy or worse, the young?

@adela_buzescu @Tiredof61983923 Perhaps Ohio's @GovMikeDeWine can join Fauci in that discussion.

https://t.co/BufR22qzP3
